ComicInfo.Summary:
The first re-mastered debut from Aspen's Big Dog Ink imprint continues!
It seems everyone is out for Shahrazad's head, yet there is one who finds her life intriguing enough to keep her alive. Janus sends Shahrazad to the arena to see if he can create an ending for this woman who's future is as uncertain as her life!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Direct Market Cover A | Mike Krome & Nei Ruffino | 1 | B | Direct Market Cover B | Elizabeth Torque | 2 | C | 1:8 Limited Edition Retailer Incentive Cover | J. Scott Campbell & Peter Steigerwald | 3 | D | AspenStore.com Exclusive Cover, Limited to 750 | Jen Broomall & Ceci de la Cruz | 4 | E | Phoenix Comicon Exclusive Cover, Limited to 250 | Nei Ruffino | 5 |
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-23 06:06:57. [CVDB490989]
